main.java.indexer.server.daos

Class UserDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.indexer.server.daos.UserDAO

  • public class UserDAO
extends java.lang.Object

    Used to access the User table in the database. Has all needed CRUD operations.

        Adds the given user to the database
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • createUser

        public User createUser(java.lang.String userName,
              java.lang.String password,
              java.lang.String lastName,
              java.lang.String firstName,
              java.lang.String email)
        Creates a new user with the given fields inside the database
        Parameters:
        userName - the UserName for the new user
        password - the hashed password for the new user
        lastName - the last name of the new user
        firstName - the first name of the new user
        email - the email of the new user
        Returns:
        The newly created user

        Reads and returns all users from the database
        Returns:
        A list of all users in the database

        Returns:

      • readUser

        public User readUser(java.lang.String userName,
            java.lang.String password)
        Reads from the database and returns the user with the given username and password
        Parameters:
        userName - the username of the user to be read from the database
        password - the hashed password of the user to be read from the database
        Returns:
        The user with the given Username and password

        Delete the user with the given username and password from the database
